abstract: America Invents Act, which overhauled United States patent system, is spurring race among law firms for star talent in small pool of patent lawyers; they account for more than 15 percent of law firm job openings while representing only 3 percent of lawyers.
snippet: The America Invents Act, which overhauled the United States patent system, is spurring a race among law firms for star talent.
lead_paragraph: The America Invents Act, which overhauled the United States patent system, is spurring a race among law firms for star talent.

headline.main: New Law Creates a Demand for Patent Specialists
headline.print_headline: New Law Creates a Demand for Patent Specialists
headline.seo: New Law Creates Demand for Patent Specialists
